channel.title: BEDROOM – Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE
channel.description: Luxury Home Furniture Designs in UAE

item.title: TRAVOLTA BED
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
With a simple silhouette and low profile, the Travolta Bed fits effortlessly into a millennial lifestyle. The trendy deep cushioned split headboard fuses form and function, inviting you to spend long hours as you sit, sleep, work and watch. The frame rests on yellow copper legs, anchoring this work of self assured style.

The post TRAVOLTA BED appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN HALF LEATHER.

LEGS IN YELLOW COPPER METAL

The post TRAVOLTA BED appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: OVERLAND BED + 2NIGHT STAND
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Overland. The name evokes adventure and journeys of discovery. Observe the headboard, let the mind travel, and you may sport a row of mountain peaks cresting the pattern and crisscrossing the visual scape. Defined in antique silver finished steel for peak impact.

The post OVERLAND BED + 2NIGHT STAND appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
BED FRAME IN HARD CHINESE PINE ,POPLAR & PLYWOOD.
MDF+VENEER IN FOSSIL OAK.

FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC.

304 GRADE ANTIQUE SIVLER STAINLESS STEEL.

The post OVERLAND BED + 2NIGHT STAND appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: ROLDAN BED
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Dotty about Art Deco? Look no further. The Roldan Bed, from profile to nailhead trim, is your dream redux of that magical age when design tried harder and influenced everything from sconces to skyscrapers. Light up the night with French flair.

The post ROLDAN BED appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
FRAME IN PINE SOLID WOOD.

FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC

The post ROLDAN BED appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: NANDI BED
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Join the dots. Classical romanticism. Chesterfield notes with button tufting and nailhead trim. Golden-age Hollywood glam in ivory leather. The Nandi Bed brings it all together as a truly luxurious experience that manages to stay light and expressive. Night stands in country-chic white finish, add to the eclectic charm of it all.

The post NANDI BED appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
FRAME IN PINE SOLID WOOD.

FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC.

The post NANDI BED appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: MIRREN BEDROOM SET
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
DELIVERY BY 31ST OCTOBER

The winged headboard is a design classic. Mirren reimagines it to create an exciting profile with an enhanced feel of luxury and a beautifully ergonomic touch that makes it a joy to sit up, lean back and binge watch. The taupe and titanium scheme tops the style quotient.

The post MIRREN BEDROOM SET appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
BED FRAME IN HARD CHINESE PINE ,POPLAR & PLYWOOD.
FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC.

304 GRADE LUX TITANIUM STAINLESS STEEL.

The post MIRREN BEDROOM SET appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: IRMA BEDROOM SET
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
DELIVERY BY 29TH OCTOBER

Soft ivory and brushed rose gold make for great bedtime stories.. There's something deeply soothing and yet striking about the soft waffle-patterned headboard accentuated by the boldly riveted bands that appear playfully out of nowhere. Irma. Featured here with customized cushions to make luxury a signature experience.

The post IRMA BEDROOM SET appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
Hard Chinese Pine ,Poplar and Plywood.
304 Stainless Steel with Brushed Rose Gold.

Fully upholstered in fabric.

The post IRMA BEDROOM SET appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: KERRY BED
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Kerry is created for those who believe style is about not trying too hard. Its understated elegance brings instant comfort and warmth to any setting. Neat parallel lines enhance the sense of depth and space while sheer simplicity makes accessorizing effortless.

The post KERRY BED appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
BED FRAME IN HARD CHINESE PINE ,POPLAR & PLYWOOD.
BIRCH WOOD LEGS.

FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC.

item.title: MARGE BED + 2 NIGHT STAND
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
DELIVERY BY 25TH OCTOBER

Marge celebrates the art of the headboard. The unique pleat pattern has been customized by our designers to bring a sense of restful energy with pyramidal forms interlocked into a rippling rhythm.

The post MARGE BED + 2 NIGHT STAND appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: ALEXANDRA BEDROOM SET
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
DELIVERY BY 30TH SEPTEMBER

Exuding an invitation to run your fingers along its grooves, the Alexandra Bed features a striking quilted finish.The exclusive waffle board pattern with buckled intersecting bands has been customised by our designers to play off the warm glow of rose gold against soft ivory tones.

The post ALEXANDRA BEDROOM SET appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: DANTE BED
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
The enduring drama of the Chesterfield theme now plays in fine bedrooms. Dante, the latest adaptation, features that definitive buttoned tufting and nailhead trim in parallel lines running down the slim headboard wings.

The post DANTE BED appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
FRAME IN PINE SOLID WOOD.

FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC.
